description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，第十三届全国人民代表大会湖北省代表。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a deputy from Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.
The majority ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The thirteenth term of the highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会代表

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表
en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的组成人员。
description.en: A member of the National People's Congress, the highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，许方盛是湖北汉川人。
description.en: According to the text, Xu Fangsheng is from Hanchuan, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，许方盛的民族是汉族。
description.en: According to the text, Xu Fangsheng's ethnicity is Han Chinese.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，许方盛是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the text, Xu Fangsheng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 许方盛是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Xu Fangsheng is a political figure in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，许方盛被选为湖北省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Xu Fangsheng was elected as a delegate from Hubei Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会代表

description.zh-cn: 许方盛的头衔是全国人大代表。
description.en: Xu Fangsheng's title is Deputy to the National People's Congress.
